import React from 'react'; const FormItem = ({ id, itemName, weight, weightType, qty, price, image }) => { return (
{itemName}
Weight:
{`${weight} ${weightType}`}
Quantity:
{qty}
Remove CHANGE
${price}
); }; export default FormItem;
